caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. EMANUEL JOHNSON, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 94-1-07630-9, Richard A. Jones, J., entered August 9, 1995.
